name: postybirb-plus
description: PostyBirb is an application that helps artists post art and other multimedia to multiple websites more quickly..

scripts.build:ui: cd ui && npm install && yarn run build
scripts.build:app: cd electron-app && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.build: yarn run build:ui && yarn run build:app
scripts.release:windows: yarn run build && cd electron-app && yarn run release:windows
scripts.release:linux: yarn run build && cd electron-app && yarn run release:linux

author: Michael DiCarlo
